duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and drive B2B sales initiatives to acquire new clients and generate revenue growth.
Proactively pursue and prioritize sales opportunities to meet and exceed business targets.
Build and maintain client relationships, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and retention.
Utilize CRM platform to track and manage client acquisition activities effectively.
Deliver compelling sales presentations and communication to bring concepts to life and drive sales.
Collaborate with the sales team to develop and execute effective sales strategies and tactics.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
